title: A Closer Look At Kenneth Copeland - H3 Podcast #232
description: On this episode we take a much closer look at a frequent meme on the podcast- the televangelist king himself Kenneth Copeland. Join us as we take a look at what runs beneath everything Kenneth does (spoiler alert: it's money).
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
itunes:subtitle: On this episode we take a much closer look at a frequent meme on the podcast- the televangelist king himself Kenneth Copeland. Join us as we take a look at what runs beneath everything Kenneth does (spoiler alert: it's money).
